title: Metalworking
description:
We carry out metalworking, produce metal products to order according to your drawings and sketches. Our company is focused on serial and small batch production. We process both non-ferrous metals such as brass, copper, aluminum, stainless steels, and ferrous metals such as steel 45, 40X, special steels and alloys.

Our controllers check complex products 100%, because the parts are responsible and the first thing that is important for the customer is to get products not only on time, but also fully qualitative, that is 100% meet the technical requirements, which we provide.

We are always glad to have new cooperation, and especially long-term cooperation, because you understand that it is profitable to have long-term partnership relations and it is very important for you as a customer to have a reliable contractor and for us to have a time-tested customer.

To order metalworking on CNC just send us drawings of products, specify terms, material, we will calculate the cost of production in the shortest possible time and give you an answer.

cards.name: Machine tools according to your drawings

about.title: Description
about.p:
We specialize in the design and manufacture of customized machine tooling, created according to your drawings and requirements. Our experience and high competence in engineering enable us to provide accurate and reliable solutions for your production.
No matter what machine tools you use or what parts you need to produce, we can create tooling that optimizes your production processes.
Partner with us to get customized tooling that meets your unique needs.
